casebody.data:
TSG FINISHING, LLC
v.
BOLLINGER. No. 25P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Matthew K. Rogers, Hickory, for TSG Finishing, LLC. Michael P. Thomas, for Bollinger, Keith. Thomas Filopoulos, for Bollinger, Keith.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of January 2015 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
